com.cognifide.slice.api.context

Interface ContextFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SliceContextFactory

    @ProviderType
public interface ContextFactory
    Factory for creating Context instances. It can create context for the following:
    • Request - it stores request and response objects in its context
    • ResourceResolver - it stores resource resolver in its context
    Author:
    Rafa≈Ç Malinowski

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String COMMON_CONTEXT_NAME

    • Field Detail

      • COMMON_CONTEXT_NAME

        static final String COMMON_CONTEXT_NAME

    • Method Detail

      • getServletRequestContext

        @Deprecated
Context getServletRequestContext(javax.servlet.ServletRequest request,
                                              javax.servlet.ServletResponse response)
        Deprecated. Use method with explicit injector name ContextFactory#getServletRequestContext(String, ServletRequest, ServletResponse)
        Parameters:
        request - request
        response - response
        Returns:
        Created Context from request and response objects. Returned Context will delegate it stored/reads to request object.

      • getServletRequestContext

        Context getServletRequestContext(String injectorName,
                                 javax.servlet.ServletRequest request,
                                 javax.servlet.ServletResponse response)
        Create Context from request and response objects. Returned Context will contain entries for ServletRequest, ServletResponse and Resource read from request (ResourceResolver is not stored in the context, but it can be read from resource stored in context). All of the values from this context are kept in specified request.
        Parameters:
        injectorName - name of injector for which a context will be created
        request - servlet request to be stored in context and which will be used to keep all values from this context
        response - servlet response to be stored in context
        Returns:
        context containing request, response and resource read from request

      • getResourceResolverContext

        Context getResourceResolverContext(org.apache.sling.api.resource.ResourceResolver resourceResolver)
        Create Context from specified resourceResolver object. All of the values from this context are kept in context itself (as a per-thread map) Returned Context will contain entry for ResourceResolver. No ServletRequest nor ServletResponse will be available in this context for use in injector.
        Parameters:
        resourceResolver - ResourceResolver to be stored in the context
        Returns:
        context containing specified resource resolver
